text: Bironico was a municipality in Lugano in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 21 November 2010 the municipalities of Bironico, Camignolo, Medeglia, Rivera and Sigirino joined together to become a new municipality, Monteceneri.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 14 January 2010 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:Villages in Ticino Category:2010 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Bironico
